duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement ABA treatment programs for children, teenagers, and adults on the autism spectrum.
Supervise the treatment team assigned to each patient’s case to ensure they are receiving top quality care.
Continuous training and learning opportunities, CARD is always on the forefront of new technology and teachings in ABA therapies.
Clear path for growth opportunities on the clinical and operations side.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in psychology or Applied Behavior Analysis or a related field required.
Certification as a behavior analyst from the Behavior Analyst Certification Board or planning to take the BCBA exam within the next 2-3 months required.
Experience working with individuals with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) required.
English proficiency, both verbal and written, is required.
